snippet: The initial testing, set to unfold over several weeks in San Antonio, will replicate tests done nearly a decade ago when the product was introduced.
lead_paragraph: The initial testing, set to unfold over several weeks in San Antonio, will replicate tests done nearly a decade ago when the product was introduced.

headline.main: Trinity Industries Tests Potentially Hazardous Guardrail
headline.print_headline: Tests Begin on Potentially Hazardous Guardrail
